Iomega Hipzip Source Code Released circa 1999

Over the course of the next few weeks, I’ll be publishing code from Interactive Objects, Fullplay Media Systems, A DOT Corporation, and MOD Systems. For example, the code base for the Iomega Hipzip, which we called Dadio OS internally at Fullplay is here.

Checkout the campy manual Iomega Hipzip Manual. Iomega Hipzip Manual
